manual_select_menu.title: Nutrition Screening Tool
manual_select_menu.description_select_menu:
Description

1. This nutrition screening form uses weight and height data to calculate the mass index. body (BMI) and data from patient history taking By specifying only 'yes' or 'no' answers.

2. This screening form does not save or store information that You fill out and screening results if you want. Screening results, please download or print after each screening.

assessment_page_start.description_page_start: Description : To make a screening Nutritional Status Assessment Model Information is required. /n - Weight /n - Height A section to use to calculate your body mass index (BMI) and have questions for you to do. Answer by choosing to answer in 2 cases, yes and no.

warning_page_start.description_warning_page_start: Would you like to leave the rating page? If you agree to leave the assessment Everything you do in this assessment will be deleted.
warning_page_start.text_if_you_agree: If you agree to leave the screening form
warning_page_start.text_will_be_delete: Everything you do in this assessment will be deleted.
warning_page_start.description_user_manual:
Description : Nutritional status screening page
1. progress tube is a tube that indicates the status of the nutritional status screening.
2. Calculate BMI, enter weight and height, then enter confirmation to calculate BMI.
3. There are four screening topics, each with a yes and no answer.

assesment_page.sub_input_weight_height: please input your weight and height for calculate your BMI
assesment_page.text_guidelines_overweight: You have a higher than normal body weight. Try to exercise more.
assesment_page.text_guidelines_normal: You have a normal body weight. Good job!
assesment_page.text_guidelines_underweight: You have a lower than normal body weight. You can eat a bit more.
assesment_page.description_assesment_weight_loss: The patient had an unintentional weight loss in During the past 6 months?
assesment_page.description_assesment_Patients_were_fed_: Patients were fed less than they used to (> 7 days).
assesment_page.description_patients_with_critical: Patients with critical illness or semi-crisis .or not

manual_assesment_bmi.description_manual_assesment_bmi: Explanation: The rating list page you can use. /n1. Progress tube is the tube indicating the status of the assessment, when doing the assessment for each item, the tube will increase /n2.Calculate the BMI when doing BMI, the BMI circle will be displayed in blue. 3. Screening topics After calculating the BMI will be able to continue the assessment

manual_assesment_screening_form.description_manual_assesment_screening_f: Description: Assessments can be viewed in order. number as follows /n1. Choose an answer: In this assessment, there is a choice of answer. There are 2 cases, yes and no. /n2. Once the answer has been selected, press the next button to do so. Evaluate the following

screening_results.description_continue_assess: Your screening result is /n- Continue the nutritional assessment. or consult a dietitian / nutrition team
screening_results.description_repeat: Your screening result is /n- The screening should be repeated once a week. during the hospital stay

alert_result.title_form: Sign the person filling in the information

results_page.description_results_page: Your screening result is /n - Continue with a nutritional assessment or consult a dietitian. Food/Nutritional team
results_page.continue_the_nutritional: Continue the nutritional assessment. or consult a dietitian/nutrition team
results_page.should_be_repeated: The screening should be repeated once a week. during the hospital stay
